name: City Crash - Berlin Mini Game Jam
name_original: City Crash - Berlin Mini Game Jam
description:
A game created in 8 hours during the Berlin Mini Game Jam, in July 2015.
Playable with one keyboard for two players. (controls below)
Engine: Construct2

CONTROLS

Pink player : WASD (S to dash down and destroy the block)
Yellow player : JIKL (K to dash down and destroy the block)

The team :

- Marcel Pace : game design
- Troy Duguid : graphics
- Calined : music and sound effects
- Alpha rats : programming
